short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension identifies allergens in products on popular UK grocery websites and displays revelant icons to inform the user.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you find it difficult to easily identify the allergens in products when doing your grocery shopping online? We did too and so the AllergyShopper browser extension was created. This early version currently supports ALDI, Tesco and ASDA UK stores. Support for more stores coming soon.
